content.prompt: Which of the following describes the relationship between price and quantity supplied according to the law of supply?

choices.label: Positive relationship, illustrated by an upward-sloping supply curve
Positive relationship, illustrated by a downward-sloping supply curve
Positive relationship, illustrated by a horizontal supply curve
Negative relationship, illustrated by an upward-sloping supply curve
Negative relationship, illustrated by a downward-sloping supply curve

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
